title: Chaos & Love
description: "He is perfect imperfection if ever it existed."- Obsessed with Romance Blog Rayne: I like Tyler, but we're just friends. That's what we agreed. We need different things and I've been down this road before. I need to focus on the dance scholarship that got me into California University, even if he's all I want when things fall apart. We're friends. There's just one problem. Tyler: Rayne made the call and I get it. She needs more than I can give her. My life is more of a disaster than a dream. Nothing good can come from being with me. I need to pretend she isn't all I think about and prove I belong on the field. Yeah, we're friends. There's just one problem. Love brings chaos and demons thrive in its wake. Can Rayne and Tyler survive the demons stalking them?   High-steam romance series about the same couple. For 18+ Trigger Warnings *cheating *issues related to abuse and violence.
author: Kat Kenyon
